title: Spa-tastic Gift Offers This October at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First ResidenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Spa-tastic Gift Offers This October at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence Published on : Tuesday, September 29, 2015
The Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence is offering a special gift of a 250 ml Perfect Visage cleansing milk with every Phytomer facial booked this October. The Youth Revealing Pioneer Treatment for Women is an advanced beauty treatment that combines a face massage with the ultimate biotechnological ingredients and exceptional treatment techniques for instantly visible results. The innovative ingredients restore the skin’s youthfulness, softness and luminosity. This is a great facial treatment for the prevention and elimination of wrinkles. The Skin Escape for Men is specially tailored for men’s needs; the high-performance ingredients used in this treatment help oxygenate and revitalise the skin, leaving it pure, fresh and moisturised.
The Spa has introduced new treatments such as the After Sport Massage, designed to target specific areas deep within the muscle tissues post workout; Chill out Massage for Women or Men uses essential oils of mandarin, lavender or rosemary in a variety of gentle flowing movements to relax the body, reduce tension and improve circulation. The benefits of the Silhouette massage are gained from the body absorbing the rich oils and the therapeutic techniques, using lemon and black pepper oils that consequently help to detoxify in a slimming or anti-cellulite program. The Floral Revive uses gentle techniques along the body’s seven chakra and essential oils of ylang-ylang and mandarin; this holistic massage is deeply soothing, relaxing and balancing to the whole nervous system. Book any of the new treatments and enjoy a special organic oil gift with every treatment.
A leading Spa in Cairo, the Spa and Wellness Centre at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence is one of Cairo’s best, offering nine treatments rooms, including a Nile-view private Spa Suite for couples.
